values: God’s Call Overcomes Our Resistance: TULIP Session 2God’s Call Overcomes Our Resistance: TULIP Session 2

For years, maybe decades, we resisted God. But then, at the perfect moment, God opened our eyes to see his glory in the face of his Son.For years, maybe decades, we resisted God. But then, at the perfect moment, God opened our eyes to see his glory in the face of his Son.
